mapper.select: select p.name, p.firstcategory,p.secondcategory,p.thirdcategory, s.quantity, w.warehousetype, b.status from stock s left join product p on s.pid = p.pid left join warehouse w on s.wid = w.wid left join inventory b on w.wid = b.wid group by p.name;

SELECT p.name, p.firstcategory, p.secondcategory, p.thirdcategory , sum(i.quantity) as quantity, wname, w.warehousetype, b.status from incoming i left join product p on i.pid=p.pid left join warehouse w on w.wid = i.wid left join stock s on s.wid = i.wid left join inventory b on b.wid = w.wid

p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
concat(p.firstcategory,p.secondcategory,p.thirdcategory) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
group by wname, p.name order by wname LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}
SELECT s.quantity, w.warehousetype, w.wname, w.capacity, sum(w.usingcapacity) as usingcapacity FROM stock s LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON s.wid = w.wid group by w.wname
